Subject: Bengtsson Peter has an Amazon.com Wish List to Share
TextBody:
Amazon.com: Online Shopping for Electronics, Apparel, Computers, Books, DVDs & more 
Bengtsson Peter requested that we send this e-mail.

A Note from Bengtsson Peter:
Check out my Wish List. Wish Lists are great for keeping track of things you'd like to have and for helping your family and friends buy gifts you really want. Thanks for taking a look.

Visit <http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/wishlist/PERFECTLYVALID/ref=cm_sw_em_r_wsl_PpsBsb0G5F2KA_w> to view the Wish List
